title: madhva muniyE namma
sahitya:
madhva muniyE namma guru madhva muniyE


anupallavi

  madhva muni nammannella uddharisuva kANirO


caraNam 1    hinde hanumantanAgi bandu rAmara pAdAra 
vindava sEvisuta Anandadinda shObhisida
    caraNam 2    ENAnga vamshAbdhi sOma kSONi pAlakara 
shirO mANikyavAgi harige prANanedenisida
    caraNam 3    kaTTa kaDeyali yOga diTTanAgi purandara 
viTTala vEda vyAsara peTTige mundopputiha
